name: Castle Diff
description:
This is short story about man who seek for treasure in abandoned castle.

Tips: 

// You have one task - try find treasure.
// Tips doesn't exist in this game.
// Items and other object that can be interactive like door are not highlighted.
(" Press E to pickup ")
// You can handle only one item in left hand (right is busy).
// To open or unlock door make sure there is handle in it first.

Good Luck
